title: WTB Only 5 More N29s for Set
author: lampertb

posts.post_title: WTB Only 5 More N29s for Set
posts.post_content:
Hello, all.  I'm Now 4 N29s away from the set.  I don't mind back damage, but I greatly prefer clean fronts.  Anyone have these?

Havlin (Pugilist)
Lange (Walker)
Johnny Murphy (Pugilist)
Slocum (Lawn Tennis)

Please PM or email if so and if you are willing to sell.  Thanks,

Richard

Surprisingly I have 2 of the 4 N29's you're looking for sale or trade which are shown on my web site at:

[url]www.imageevent.com/brailey[/url]

then go the 19th century tab.  Add $3 shipping.

Let me know.

Mike

PM sent, Mike.  Please PM or email re: payment.  Thanks,

Richard
